comments: When I click on Mylar icon on the Package Explorer view I am getting popup dialog "The chosen operation is not currently avaialble"
Looks like you have a misconfiguration (i.e. this means Mylar classes didn't load).  Could you please provide details on your configuration?  Anything in the log?
Wasn't anything in the log. That thing disappeared after few restarts.
Was it Callisto, or plain RC7?

How it is related? I am still not using any Project Explorer.

Anyways, I do have some WTP stuff installed, though not using it much, maybe except XML editor and things like GEF...

I don't think it would be related to the Project Explorer.  Usually when something as wierd as this (a plug-ins classes not loading) happens it is because the plug-in failed to start (should be an error in the log, multipe of smae installed, bad dependencies, etc) or because the Eclipse configuration is borken (running with -clean can help).  Marking as WORKSFORME for now, but if you have any additional invormation that we should investigate, or if this occurrs with tomorrow's dev build please post.

While I couldn't replicate, this should be fixed now and I added exception handling for such a startup race condition.  If you see any errors related to this in the log please post thenm.

New dev build should be replicated in 10 minutes.
